column4: Hi everyone. I am a software developer, having some general trouble with the 64 bit version. Where do I best address my questions, and maybe also make some improvement suggestions about the difficulties I encountered?

OK, I'll just summarize the improvment request first: I've built a 32 bit Gtk app. When I tried to launch it double clicking it from the "Explorer", it would not give me any error msg. When I launched it from Terminal, all I got was "No such file or directory". I think this needs better error msgs
